item.title: SNB Interactive Part 3: Choke Points and Initial Run on Virtuoso
item.description: In this post we will look at running the LDBC SNB on Virtuoso.

item.title: OWL-Empowered SPARQL Query Optimization
item.description: The Linked Data paradigm has become the prominent enabler for sharing huge volumes of data using Semantic Web technologies, and has created novel challenges for non-relational data management systems, such as RDF and graph engines.
